website_summaries.verdict: A great swim shoe, but probably not durable enough for active, everyday wear.
pros: Water-friendly synthetic upper with foam lining
Antimicrobial EVA footbed, EVA midsole, flexible rubber outsole
cons: May run large, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Serious Quality Issues
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of these in toddler size 10 for my son and daughter, and both pairs had serious quality issues (dried glue squeezing out of the edges, areas where they weren't glued at all, etc.) I expected much more from Teva - usually a quality and reputable brand. I took these pictures right out of the box, then packaged them back up for return. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are adorable and easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.text: My son's school requires closed toe water shoes during waterpark play in the summer. He has wide feet. These sandals are adorable and easy to take on and off. But they run on the small side especially the toe part. I will order another pair next year. However, I will go one size larger than the usual Teva size.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Days

customer_reviews.title: Run huge but seem like pretty good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I would say my son is wearing a 6 but he can wear his size 7 New Balance. So I ordered these in a 7 and they are HUGE. unwearable falling off huge. Not slightly long in the toe. Just plain huge even with the Velcro as tight as it can go. Way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Toe issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. They're cute and seem comfortable. I bought them to hopefully use in the sand at our park and beach which actually has not worked out because he hates the feeling of the sand going in the shoes. Nevertheless there quick and easy. My biggest complaint is that his big toe pops out sometimes on one side no matter how I adjust them. I think it was just our dumb luck the way they were cut. That's the reason for the 3 stars, ow would be a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gieszl

customer_reviews.title: good and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are decent little water shoes. I bought size 4 and find them to be slightly longer than other size 4 shoes. My baby still doesn't walk much so she doesn't get a ton of use out of these but I like that they fit securely and seem to have good grip to the bottom to prevent slipping. They are also soft and comfortable on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: C.Santana

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, and he prefers these to the flip flops he lived in before. He has a narrow foot, but the regular size worked great. We've been on vacation and he's worn them every day, in the ocean and hiking or walking around and they still look new, through sand and mud, a quick rinse and they are back to "new" shape.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great for creek-stomping!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 7-1/2 year old loves these shoes. He usually wears a 2-1/2 or 3. We bought a 3 and it fits a little big, but not too big (one of my thumb's widths from the end of his big toe to the end of the footbed). Even though he wishes there was not as much room on the toe, i'm happy with the purchase because he has room to grow. He has worn them every day since receiving them, and says they are very comfortable. We like to go creek-stomping and these have worked perfectly for that!
customer_reviews.author: 4littlefeet

customer_reviews.title: Great water shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great - I love the non-skid bottom, hook and look closure, and covered toe. The shoe does seem to run big based on other shoes in same size, but the adjustable closure helps. My son has worn these a few times now and no complaints or sores on his feet.They do dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: MelanieF

customer_reviews.title: ... son said it is a bit narrow and not easy to put on so I have to returned this
customer_reviews.text: My younger son said it is a bit narrow and not easy to put on so I have to returned this. But, my other son likes it a lot. The colors and style is sharp and cool. Almost not like sandlas and I do like the clost toes design to protect their feet and from kicking in staffs. It is not a lot of support so I don't think it is mean for wearing it for long hours. But, my son did wear it sometime at Hawaii during a few days trip other than his regular tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT sandal for kids!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried other sandals and every year we revert back to this one (since we found them). We’re on our 4th pair and I won’t be attempting to buy any other sandals other than these as she grows. They fit her kind-of-wide feet perfectly, are very durable, can get wet, easy to put on, no annoying extra straps or tags. I also love that her toes are protected. The only time I’ve had to buy a new pair is when she’s grown out of her other ones and even then they’re still in good enough condition to hand down or donate. LOVE the sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen E Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are adorable! I bought the yellow and black Teva Tidepool Water Sandals for my grandson. They fit him in the same size as his normal everyday shoes. They work very nice for splash days and water walking parks. They have very nice velcro closure and semi closed toes. The soles seem to be sturdy and hopefully will last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Im Dallas

customer_reviews.title: They look like nice shoes but they probably won’t fit her for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar pair of Teva sandals in a size 3 for my daughter, and they were much too small. Her heel was off the end by at least an inch. That exact style wasn’t in stock in a size 4, so I bought these in a 4 and they’re huge! They look like nice shoes but they probably won’t fit her for another 2 years. They’re also very wide, I can fit my while hand in the shoe with her skinny foot. I won’t be surprised if her feet get too long for them long before her feet are wide enough to fill them.
customer_reviews.author: Zhandra

customer_reviews.title: Love these, they are very comfortable for my 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are very comfortable for my 2 year old daughter and easy for her to get on and off herself. Update: Got another pair for my 1 year old as he started walking during the summer, these are perfect. The material is great and does not chafe his skin at the heel as many other kinds of shoes have. The covered toe is also a really great feature for new walkers so they don't scuff their toes while learning to walk (especially when outside). We used these as regular sandals - not just water sandals. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: KReece

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandals for spring and summer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my 2 year-old son as an easy-on/easy-off option for the Spring and Summer. I could not be more pleased! They are lightweight, yet they are comfortable and provide great traction on slippery surfaces. I like that there are two velcro straps across the top for easy adjustments, and I REALLY like that they come in a size 7-8. My son is not quite a 7.5, so he has plenty of room to grow in these. Great price, too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMama

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price............
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pair for each of my granddaughters last year at this time.... My one granddaughter wore hers so much that basically she first outgrew them and wore down the one part of the shoe. My daughter-in-law could not get her to stop wearing them. The other two granddaughters are like brand new. I purchased a second pair (of course the next size) and she was soooo thrilled and I had to keep the same color (pink).
customer_reviews.author: Grandma1

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loved these shoes and walked in them well
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loved these shoes and walked in them well, but they didn't last long. I got them on April 10th, and by June 24th, the sole of one of the shoes was missing in action. He wore them about 1-2 hours a day on days we played outside. Some days, they weren't worn at all. He's only 16 months old, so I don't figure that he did anything particularly destructive ...they just weren't made to last. Despite this, I might actually buy them again. They were great while they were in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up :-)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with these sandals. She's worn them a handful of times & says that they are very comfortable. She has no complaints with them & they don't rub on her toes/haven't caused any blisters. They are super light weight & look to be well made. I purchased them in the same size as other shoes she is wearing & they fit as expected. The pink color is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cute But Cause Stinky Feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my 3 year old boy. I wish they came in half sizes because that's what he really needed. After looking for sandals on amazon, I picked these based on the good reviews. My biggest complaint is that they stink and make his feet stink really badly! For $30 sandals, I am not happy. However, I appreciate them being a solid navy color; they did go with everything he wore this summer. And they do wash well and have held up.
customer_reviews.author: MrsFalconinLA

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried when I ordered these because I did not want them to be too small for my daughter. She wears a size 3 and they fit great. I love the Velcro on them and that she can get them wet. Perfect for summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Worn everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: My little boy has worn these shoes in lakes, streams, and the playground! They are flexible but still have a good nonslip tread. The fit is just ok, since the strap is on the side of the shoes and not down the middle. But I think if we hadn't ordered them big, this would have been better. After they get wet, they have a little bit of an odor. But we have gotten a lot of wear out of these shoes! A good buy for Tevas!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My 16 month old daughter is able to walk comfortably in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 16 month old daughter is able to walk comfortably in these shoes. We are hoping to use them on our vacation to the beach, so we'll see how they stand up there. My only issue is that they did not have the shoe in a pink or purple color when we bought them. But I'm glad we bought them anyway because they seem great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Diana S

customer_reviews.title: Does not last.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loved these sandals. She wore them daily during the summer. Comfortable, easy to run in, great for water play, and all things summer. Unfortunately, the fell apart before summer ended. The soles started peeling off in July and by the very beginning of August we had to trash them because the sole of both shoes had completely come off. My husband tried some gorilla glue, but it just came off again. Very disappointed in the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DSmommy

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, but odd sizing...
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these for my 11-year-old granddaughter in a size 5 BIG kid. When they arrived I discovered that they would actually fit me (an adult size 8 in the US), so I returned them and reordered a size 3 LITTLE kid which did fit my granddaughter with just a little growing room. Other than the unusual sizing, these are really cute sandals and my granddaughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis C

customer_reviews.title: No traction
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't even let my little one wear these. The bottoms had no grip on them. Not sure why anyone would make sandles for little ones without grip on the bottom. I could just imagine if it was a wet ground it would equal an automatic fall.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased regular loop Velcro Tevas last year but these are way easier. My son can put them on without our help and are very easy to adjust. Also, there is not the triangle plastic piece where sandals normally loop so they seem a lot more comfortable. My son prefers these sandals over his crocs now.
customer_reviews.author: ErinBrum

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Easy to clean with a soft brush and soap. Easy to put on. The last pair we bought was in use for 10 months every day (at school and at the playground) before the sole got worn down.
customer_reviews.author: mkj

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, no blisters, great price
customer_reviews.text: Third year in a row I had purchased these Sandals for my toddler. He lives them. Hey are light weight and durable. They take a beating ever summer and still last! They are slip resistant and never cause blisters. They do tend to run slightly larger in size. I will get these every year and I always get them for such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Good light sandal
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 9 for my almost 2 year old. Shoe is light and flexible. I'm not sure how comfortable the place of the strap on the side is though...or how secure my son feels. the straps in front and at ankle are good, he can pull open when he want to play with it. Used plenty of times and still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slight design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light and mostly do the job, but (for my 2-year-old anyway), there's a design flaw that lets her big toe stick out. Not a huge deal, but not ideal either. Would give 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: CTC19

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Material is very light, and overall shoe is poorly made. The cut outs on the sides are uneven, different sizes completely, and both my children's big toes slip out the upper inside hole. Returning and looking for something else. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. We always purchased Natives for the summer, but they don't come in half sizes and unfortunately, they kept slipping off. These shoes fit his foot perfectly. A tiny bit large - which is fine, since the straps are adjustable. He was able to run (and he seriously runs), play in the sprinkler and jump in these sandals. Well made Teva. Nice subdued color ways also.
customer_reviews.author: Native NY Mother

customer_reviews.title: Cute active summer wear for busy young kids
customer_reviews.text: I may upgrade to I love it but we have only had them a week so I want to wait and see how long they last with an active 5 year old. Love the color combo and so far no blisters which is awesome as the last expensive pair of summer sandals (not Teva) she wore she had blisters within 30 minutes : ( I'm hoping these will be the hit of our summer.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water shoe- in big kids size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for our trip to the beach, could be washed off in the showers after the beach and was so comfy for my kiddo. He was really hard to find water sandals for (big kids size 5)
customer_reviews.author: Tkolive

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. They're pretty sturdy, even with daily use. The traction on these shoes is really good, especially when your little one is in the pool. Easy to get them on/off, and the velcro closure is pretty durable. I haven't had any problems with them rubbing on my daughters feet like some other water shoes can do. They also dry relatively quickly, so no stink! Just bought my daughter another size up- highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, but pretty big
customer_reviews.text: Son says these shoes are very comfortable, and they seem to be high quality. He's been wearing them daily for weeks and they look brand new. However, they run quite large. It's a good thing that it doesn't really matter since he's not wearing them for school or anything, and really, they are so big he might even be able to still wear them NEXT summer.
customer_reviews.author: C.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: My son loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year old as a water shoe for a trip to Greece. These were a big hit! He ended up going in the water without these for the most part, but he loved how easy they were to get on and off. His feet are widest at the front, and he was able to adjust the front strap to his liking. And when he did get them wet they dried quickly. He would still wear them all the time if his school allowed him.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Study sandal..great alternative to flip flops for beach and hiking
customer_reviews.text: Soft uppers, really nice material...just wish it had 3 adjustable straps as the other colors had. As with ones in olive we bought our grandson, the shoebed is very wide...length just ride snd sturdy sole. Our granddaughter loves the color..she picked it...lol
customer_reviews.author: Clgmaui

customer_reviews.title: Cute/Comfortable/Durable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd year in a row ordering these for my 8 yr old daughter. They are very durable and last the entire Spring-Fall Seasons. Very soft and comfortable for my daughter and they don't rub her feet like most other sandals. They do run a full size too Big. Order down.
customer_reviews.author: ALISA

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. My daughter seems to like wearing them. They haven't gotten wet yet, so I don't know how quickly they dry. UPDATE: They dry pretty quickly (much faster than her other sandals). They are getting worn in the toe area after a few months of use, but I'll see how they do over the next few months before dropping the rating to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: They seem like they're gonna get dirty pretty quickly
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these, and they fit well. A little room to grow, but not floppy. My daughter has a narrow foot, though, so that could be accounting for a bit of the largeness. They seem like they're gonna get dirty pretty quickly. These weren't so expensive that I'll be upset if they get nasty before too long, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: The product is awesome. My grandson wants to wear them all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome. My grandson wants to wear them all the time. He wears an extra wide tennis shoe which limits sandals. The Tevas ran a little wide which was perfect with the Velcro adjustable straps. He loves the bright green.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Burrow

customer_reviews.title: The open toe shoes work fine.
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 styles of shoes here and I tried them all. The pink closed toe shoes have a very high back, which I don't think can fit any child, will create a blister in no time. The closed toe shoes that are open on the side had a major problem with babies toe coming out of shoes and popping through the hole. The open toe shoes work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Z.

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews that these ran big so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that these ran big so I ordered a size 2 since my eight year old wears a three they were too small her heels were hanging off the back her toes reached the end. They are definitely true to size, order what your child wears. Then upon return it costs me as much to ship them back as they cost. You have to pay to ship them back.
customer_reviews.author: Mene' Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: They’re great for water play or general summer park stuff
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves theses sandals. We’ve purchased a pair two summers in a row and I’m considering a third! They are durable, protect his toes from scuffs or tripping, and he could put hem on himself when he was two. They’re great for water play or general summer park stuff. I wish they came in some different boy colors so it was less obvious when we buy them each year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Such cute sandals! The straps are very soft which is important as they can leave marks in my kid's ankle if they are made of hard material. Adjustable and should fit for a long time! Very pleased! I have always found this brand to be reliable in their quality and these shoes have reaffirmed that belief.
customer_reviews.author: HrnyhairyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect In Every Way
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water sandals. Well made, slip resistant, comfortable, and attractive. I put them on my 15 month old baby boy and he immediately took off walking. He didn't want me to take them off! The sole of shoe is durable yet flexible allowing him to grip the ground appropriately. The fit is completely accurate. I'd definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Monique M.

customer_reviews.title: Looked to be ok quality but were way too big ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked to be ok quality but were way too big. Ordered a size 10 which is what my grandson wears and these were so big that it would be 2 years before he could wear them. I am hoping they were mis sized and not how they are supposed to be. We needed them quickly so retuned these and bought a different style at the store in person.
customer_reviews.author: periwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sandals, good for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off, soft cushy straps, good grip on the soles (important for walking up slides etc). My little guy has wider feet (high volume) and these fit him well - standard tevas we can barely get on loose as they will go but these have ample velcro left we could loosen if needed. Deep blue is great color and like the subtle design.
customer_reviews.author: Ktay

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe; runs small
customer_reviews.text: Solidly-made sandal, cute color options. Runs small - my toddler wears an 8 in Carter's and Stride Rite, and the Teva 8 was too small. Had to return because product was not available in larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Nat W

customer_reviews.title: Cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute water shoe. It looked sturdy enough also. Since our son is going through growth spurts we decided against this closed toe design. I would recommend it to others though. Returned it and kept the open toe Teva.
customer_reviews.author: Native NY Mother

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with Teva
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Teva quality. And oh so cute! The color is as advertised. My Granddaughter enjoys wearing them at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Dreamville

customer_reviews.title: Excellent supportive active sandal
customer_reviews.text: Teva rocks. They do sandals so well. Super comfortable so my daughter can wear them out running around, but still a bit girly can she can wear them with a summer dress. Kids need supportive footwear too!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and practical!
customer_reviews.text: We are quite happy with these shoes. My three year old can put them on and remove them without help, which is great for her development and easy on mommy! They seem to have a good non slip grip on the bottom. Be aware, though, they are water shoes, not everyday shoes. My child wears them to the pool and anywhere the ground might be wet and slippery. She says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for summer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son, who is nine years and wears a size 3. I was a little unsure of ordering the boys size 3 because it was listed as "little kid". If you're wondering - the toddler sizes are exactly what they mean - the toddler kid sizes. The little kid and big kid sizes are the typical youth sizes. They fit get, comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent "pool" sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are decent "pool" sandals, a step up from flip flops, but not something I would have the kids wear all the time as I think they would eventually fall apart. They fit a bit large so if your child is on the half size - go down to the lower half size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Well made and super comfortable. Cute, protective style. Lightweight. Ran a little small though so my daughter couldn’t use it for long.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda F.

customer_reviews.title: I love this sandal for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal for my baby. It fits him perfectly. It has good traction as he was able to climb up his First Step Slide on the slide-side without slipping. He's wearing this every where this summer! It's a good alternative to his other sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: aimz

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got really sick of buying expensive hiking sandals for my growing boys that took a breaking in time long enough for them to be too small before they were ever comfortable. These are comfortable out of the box and light weight. I ordered some for my toddler and my 9-year-old. They're true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I was expecting. My son loves them. He was having trouble with flip flops and always trying to take them off, but he will actually keep these on. They can get wet no problem. Dirty no problem, they could be hosed off. Size 9 were starting to get snug on other brands so I got a size 10 and they fit great but also have room to grow because of the adjustable nature of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SFlan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! They are super comfy! They don't leave blisters and can be worn in the water. My son has worn these everyday since the weather got warmer and they seem to be holding up!
customer_reviews.author: Lez McC

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the size 8 for my Granddaughter. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size 8 for my Granddaughter. The size 7 had started to get tight (growing foot). I didn't realize it but the size 8 is the exact same size as the 7. She's worn them several times so I cannot return them. $$$ down the drain. How's it possible they're the exact same size ?
customer_reviews.author: Bham Man

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, his toes closed, But sandals are still pretty open so it’s not hot during summer. We used it for 2 seasons. Very happy and will buy it again bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable from the start!
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 pairs in different colors. They are so comfortable from the first time wearing them. The adjustable straps are perfect for my crooked feet!
customer_reviews.author: flamingo chick

customer_reviews.title: two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, super cute, easy material to wash, true to size and would definitely recommend this product. Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: tlf

customer_reviews.title: adorable, comfy water shoe, wish they offered larger sizes
customer_reviews.text: so cute, and comfy on our little one, wish they offered them in larger sizes! He loves to walk and play in the ocean and these stay perfectly fit on his feet without leaving any red marks.. His feet are happy, he's happy, i'm happy..
customer_reviews.author: SoMote

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy, clean
customer_reviews.text: BOTH my kids wear these shoes all summer. They clean with a brush and soap, are amazingly comfortable. If I could give them 10 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: M. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Eventually stinks
customer_reviews.text: Great at first then smelled like cat pee! Couldn't believe it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved these shoes. He doesn't scrape his toes or walk at an angle. I could see a problem with these with any kid who tends to scrape the front of his shoes when he walks. He's been wearing them daily and he loves the green.
customer_reviews.author: Review Happy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we expected and exactly as pictured. Holding up well after a whole summer of use on rocky beaches for my 20 month old. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Kdmalkmus

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but they seem to run small and they don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but they seem to run small and they don't have too much stretch. My daughter kept complaining, I had to open two slits on the pinkie toe so it wouldn't be so tight. Since she used them at the beach I didn't want to return them used.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Super light and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 2 year old son, who had very chunky feet. And these sandals worked out great for him. They are super light and he seems to be comfortable running in them all day long. No matter where he was playing in water, grass, mud, rocks they held up perfectly. And best part he was able to take them off and on himself. I think I'm going to get some for him for next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves these, fit well and she could ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves these, fit well and she could put them on all by herself. Only complaint is that the material will retain smells if you spill on it
customer_reviews.author: Amy G

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not as durable as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was fine. It took a little bit longer to arrive than expected and VERY lightweight. Not nearly as durable as I'd expected. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kimbec

customer_reviews.title: We loved these shoes
customer_reviews.text: We loved these shoes, but 3 months after purchase the entire sole separated from the bottom of the shoe. I'm sure we can buy some she repair glue to fix it. But for 3 months of use, we shouldn't have to be repairing for what clearly is a defect.
customer_reviews.author: BBbrooke

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal for narrow feet. The straps allow my daughter to tighten the sandals to the width she needs to feel comfortable. Also great for going in rivers and rocky beaches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am not satisfied, uncomfortable and hot sandy for the summer and my boy is very worried when wearing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal- order one size down though!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd year I have ordered Tevas- they run big so order a size down. My daughter wears a 10 in toddlers and the size 9 in Tevas fits great. Same for my son who wears a size 8 in sneakers but the size 7 fits for Tevas.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Happy girl, happy mommy.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are a win with both me and my daughter. She likes the colors and comfort, I like the quality, ease of adjusting fit, and that she can get them them on and off herself. Hopefully they will prove as durable as I expect from the Teva brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Eastberg

customer_reviews.title: Good for medium or wide maybe, not narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: Not for narrow feet. Straps had to be pulled so tight that they didn't line up correctly, more diagonally, and too much hanging over the edge.
customer_reviews.author: MomArtist

customer_reviews.title: These are great, lightweight outdoor shoes that are easy to dry ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, lightweight outdoor shoes that are easy to dry when kids play in water. Not a true water shoe by any means, but when you unexpectedly happen upon a place with a splash pad or misters, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Stockenberg

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect for my daughter last year and I only wish ...
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my daughter last year and I only wish there were more sizes available for this season. They were a great price, comfortable and lightweight. Best for a single season.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynBuyer

customer_reviews.title: They are super comfy and he loves wearing them now that we're ...
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old loves these sandals. They are super comfy and he loves wearing them now that we're getting close to summer. Can't wait to take them to the pool. He can even put them on himself. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: flyersbrb

customer_reviews.title: Fit well
customer_reviews.text: LIked these so much for my son, my wife bought a pair for herself as well to wear around the house in warmer weather. Fit snugly, have not worn out in several years. Time will tell as usual as to their endurance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! On our second pair!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last summer for my then 1,5 year old, she loved them and wore them everywhere. She has a narrow foot, so these are easy to adjust, whereas other sandals are too wide and fall off easily. She loves the pair we bought this year just as much as she did last year. Perfect for all day wear, and at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: ACTumpt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 year old to wear on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old to wear on our trip to Arizona. I ordered her size which is a 2 and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: workout

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and adorable look!
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter has chubby little feet and these are great fitting. They look adorable too! So many little girl sandals have thinner straps and aren't adjustable at both ankle and toe areas. These are and they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Novotny

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started wearing these and she loves them - she insists on wearing them everyday. My favorite thing about them is that they're super light. I would recommend and buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maresa

customer_reviews.title: nice upper. am returning as they don't fit
customer_reviews.text: runs big, sole is vpretty hard. nice upper. am returning as they don't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Filkins

customer_reviews.title: 5-2 and I loved them so much I got him another pair this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair to Teva I have got my son. I got him a pair when he was 1.5-2 and I loved them so much I got him another pair this summer hes 3 now and they fit great and he can put them on himself. durable and light.
customer_reviews.author: 🍑🍒🍓

customer_reviews.title: These have become my daughter's favorite shoes. She is two but she can very ...
customer_reviews.text: These have become my daughter's favorite shoes. She is two but she can very easily put them on by herself. They seem to be sturdy, well made, and easy to clean. They are also more graceful looking than most bulky water shoes which is a big plus for me. So far we are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ShailaYuri

customer_reviews.title: I am an elderly woman who had difficulty finding comfortable shoes until I realized my size is a boys ...
customer_reviews.text: I am an elderly woman who had difficulty finding comfortable shoes until I realized my size is a boys 5. The sandal fits perfectly , is sturdy and very comfortable to walk in. Is easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: ltcs.

customer_reviews.title: I love these. They look comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They look comfortable; no blisters. Great on my daughter who has narrow feet and my son who has wide feet because of the adjustable straps. They made of the same or similar material as swim shoes which makes them perfect for rainy Florida summer days.
customer_reviews.author: Giulia

customer_reviews.title: Great price, comfy to wear all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a quick trip to Hawaii, they served their purpose and didn't irritate my daughters feet as long as the top strap wasn't tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kfess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased. It’s comfy n non-slippery.
customer_reviews.author: 🐶🐶🐶

customer_reviews.title: Happy 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size and my daughter loves them. Sturdy and comfy. The box was was in excellent conditions and there were no dents. The sandals are just as pictured. Could not beat the price. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: steffy🧡

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: Great toddler sandals. My son can put them on and take them off pretty easily by himself at 2.5 years old. They are easy to clean if they get dirty and he can wear them in water. I love them. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: No blisters after 3 days at Universal Studios!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old wanted to wear these all three days at Universal. We were there from 10-9 everyday. I took back up shoes but his feet were still perfect at the end of each day. No blisters at all! We did a lot of wet rides and these dried fast.
customer_reviews.author: Prime

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but sizing seems off
customer_reviews.text: Nice & comfy sandal for my son whose sneaker size is a 7 (he's 11 years old). However, we ordered this in a size 7 and it was a whole size too big. We'll hang onto this pair until his feet grow bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a lightweight, waterproof sandal that my child could wear to camp, pool or any time. Took a chance on this Teva sandal and we're all very happy. My 5 year old likes to wear them all the time. He says they're comfortable and he likes the fit. In fact, I ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves them and she has plenty of room to grow in. She has fallen on her face a few times, as the toe of the shoe catches the floor. I would buy these again. Haven't tested them in water yet.
customer_reviews.author: RxDr

product_meta.title: Teva Tidepool Sport Sandal (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid)
